Description: Two joining fragments from rim of pottery mortarium, Light yellow clay, fairly dense, core pinkish-red. Graffito on inside of lip: vac κρι[ retrograde.
Curator's comments: Perhaps from the same vessel as British Museum 1886,0401.79 and 1910,2022.18
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (p. 61, pl. XXXII, no. 71)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 645, no. 32, pl. 19.1.3)
Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (no. 8)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.14)
